content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft fire_charge. Fire_charge requires placing 1 blaze_powder and 1 coal in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to craft blaze_powder. Blaze_powder requires placing 1 blaze_rod in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the blaze_rod from slot 21 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I can craft the blaze_powder by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have crafted blaze_powder, I need to move it into the crafting grid to craft fire_charge. I will move the blaze_powder from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have moved the blaze_powder into the crafting grid, I need to move the coal into the crafting grid. I will move the coal from slot 18 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have moved the blaze_powder and coal into the crafting grid, I can craft the fire_charge. I will move the fire_charge from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: fire_charge
inventory=[{"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]

Ok
